root.text: Red Hat System Administration is designed for professionals who are new to Linux. This course will actively engage students in task focused activities, lab-based knowledge checks, and facilitative discussions to ensure maximum skill transfer and retention. In addition GUI-based Environment will be featured to build on the student's existing technical knowledge, while command line concepts will be introduced to provide a foundation for students planning to become full time Linux system administrator.
In this workshop, the following aspects from red hat will be discussed,
and combining with hands on experience in Red Hat Linux environment.
